human.name: Human
human.special: Humans may select 1 extra Trappings Card from the remaining cards before beginning their adventure.

gnome.name: Gnome
gnome.special: Gnomes perform both actions at the campsite instead of picking one.

kroling.name: Kroling
kroling.special: Once per dungeon level, while in combat, the Kroling may flip a single die to the reverse side when determining damage

merfolk.name: Merfolk
merfolk.special: Whenever Merfolk resolve a location with a water icon, they may either gain 1 Health or 1 Energy.

axe.name: Axe
axe.description: When you roll doubles during combat, you may reroll. You may discard this card to deal damage equal to the sum of rolling two dice.

books.name: Books
books.description: Gain 1 extra energy when you rest at a campsite.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: When in combat, and if you are resolving the first dungeon card, you inflict an additional 1 damage on successful hits.

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: When in combat against an undead enemy, you inflict an additional 1 damage on successful hits.

potion.name: Potion
potion.description: You may discard this card to gain 2 health and 2 energy.

bedroll.name: Bedroll
bedroll.description: Gain 1 extra health when you rest at a campsite.

scroll.name: Scroll
scroll.description: When encountering an undead enemy, you mnay discard this card to vanquish them. You gain no favor when defeating an enemy in this manner.

toolkit.name: Toolkit
toolkit.description: When encountering a trap, you may attempt to disarm it. ⚀: Take double damage ⚁⚂: Take normal damage ⚃⚄⚅: Take no damage.

darkrats.name: darkrats
darkrats.special: When you defeat a dark rat, you gain 1 food. Yummy!

Doom Skull.name: doomskull
Doom Skull.special: The doom skull always attacks first.

Mimic.name: mimic
Mimic.special: When you defeat a mimic, you gain fate points equal to the dungeon level you are on.

Possessor.name: possessor
Possessor.special: When you defeat a possessor, you gain 1 shard

Skelepede.name: skelepede
Skelepede.special: Skelepedes do not miss when they attack. They always re-roll doubles.

Speyeder.name: speyeder
Speyeder.special: You lose 1 energy every time the speyeder successfully hits during combat.

Watcher.name: watcher
Watcher.special: You lose 1 energy before combat begins when fighting a Watcher.

Wraith.name: wraith
Wraith.special: You lose 1 favor every time the wraith successfully hits during combat.

loot.gillnet: When fishing, you may roll 3 times instead of 1. Each success gains you 1 food.
loot.potion: You may discard this card to gain 2 health and 2 energy.
loot.ring: Once per dungeon level you may spend 1 favor to avoid combat with an enemy.
loot.shield: Reduce damage from attacks by 1. Discard this shield if you take 6 or more damage in a single blow.
loot.sword: You no longer miss in combat when you roll doubles. When doubles are rolled, you now deal 5 damage.
loot.symbol: When at the Altar, you jay gain the reward one level higher than what your favor would otherwise indicate.
loot.turnip: When you encounter the pigman, you may discard this card to gain a shard, or you may discard it at any time to gain 3 energy.
loot.wedge: You may discard this card to avoid combat with an enemy.

reference.altar: You may gain a blessing from the altar based on your current level on the favor tracker. 0-3: 1 Health 4-5 2 Health and 1 Energy 6-7: 3 Health and 2 Energy 8-9: 4 Health and 3 Energy 10+: 1 Shard or Full Health
reference.campsite: You may rest at the campsite, gaining 2 health and 1 energy. Or, you may search for provisions, gaining 1 food.
reference.grove: You may search the grove for mushrooms. Each mushroom found equals 1 food. Roll a die to see how many you find:  ⚀: Get lost and lose 1 energy ⚁: Find nothing edible ⚂⚃: Find 1 mushroom ⚄⚅: Find 2 mushrooms
reference.labyrinth: You find yourself lost in a cavernous maze. Spend 1 food to esacpe. If you have no food, spend 2 energy to escape. If you have no food or energy, spend 3 health to escape.
reference.pigman: You may allow the pigman to place a blessing on you, gaining 1 favor. Or, you may trade a turnip with the pigman for 1 shard.
